Samsung galaxy s6.description: Samsung Galaxy S6 is the latest smartphone with advanced features and a sleek design.

Nokia lumia 1520.description: Nokia Lumia 1520 is a Windows-based smartphone with a large screen and powerful performance.

HTC One M9.description: The HTC One M9 is powered by 1.5GHz octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 810 processor and it comes with 3GB of RAM. The phone packs 32GB of internal storage that can be expanded up to 128GB via a microSD card.
